title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Deutsche Bank accelerates Cloud journeys with Google Cloud Consulting

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Google Cloud Consulting worked with Deutsche Bank to create a Cloud Engineering Program that trained thousands of engineers in cloud engineering. The program used Generative AI to deliver personalized, interactive training that combines on-demand convenience with instructor-led effectiveness, with Google Cloud Consulting Learning Services providing the creative and technical expertise to accelerate the bank's cloud journey.
bullets: Designed novel learning experiences to make thousands of engineers fluent in cloud engineering.
Leveraged Generative AI to create personalized, interactive training content.
Blended on-demand learning with instructor-led sessions for greater effectiveness.
Google Cloud Consulting Learning Services supplied creative innovation and technical expertise.
Built the Deutsche Bank Cloud Engineering Program to accelerate the cloud journey at scale.
takeaways: Investing in AI-driven, scalable training can rapidly upskill operations and engineering teams for cloud environments.
Combining on-demand modules with instructor-led instruction improves practical readiness for cloud operations.
Engaging specialized cloud consulting partners provides design and technical capabilities to speed migration and modernization.
A formal cloud engineering program helps standardize skills and accelerate organizational cloud adoption timelines.

items.title: Year-end toolkit: Strengthening audit committee collaboration

ai.summary: Based on the available description… This episode of PwC’s year-end toolkit focuses on strengthening the finance team’s engagement with the audit committee, streamlining year-end accounting and reporting, and addressing emerging oversight areas. Topics include improving management/audit committee collaboration, year-end issue readiness, AI oversight (risks, opportunities, controls), enterprise risk oversight, evolving cyber risk, and elevating proxy disclosures.
bullets: Practical guidance on strengthening management and audit committee communication and collaboration.
Key year-end accounting and reporting issues finance teams should be prepared to address.
Oversight of AI: discussion of risks, opportunities, and necessary controls.
Enhancing enterprise risk oversight and navigating evolving cyber risk in the age of AI.
Guidance on elevating proxy disclosures and reporting around transformation initiatives.
takeaways: Proactively engage the audit committee on year‑end accounting and reporting matters that could affect grid/data center operations.
Be prepared to explain AI-related risks, opportunities, and controls applied to operational and decision-support systems.
Strengthen enterprise risk oversight and ensure governance reporting captures operational resilience and transformation initiatives.
Demonstrate how cyber risk management is evolving in the age of AI, with clear governance and controls for audit-committee review.
Ensure proxy and other governance disclosures reflect material risks and strategic changes affecting grid/data center assets.

items.title: Zip Up, Clip In, Copilot On

ai.summary: Based on the available description, the video follows Jo discovering the power of Copilot Groups and presents route planning as made easy. It highlights Microsoft Copilot and AI features in a short promotional/demo style.
bullets: Jo explores Copilot Groups.
Emphasizes making route planning easy.
Published by the Microsoft Copilot channel.
Uses hashtags: #copilot #microsoftcopilot #ai
takeaways: The video positions Copilot Groups as a tool to simplify route planning workflows.
Decision-makers overseeing site access, maintenance routing, or field logistics should note the claimed capability.
Consider evaluating Microsoft Copilot features for route coordination and scheduling pilots.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description… AI in audit is presented as a current, everyday tool that supports repetitive tasks, analysis of large data sets and decision-making. KPMG speakers describe practical solutions (AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI, KPMG Clara and Clara for Clients), the shift from sampling to full-population analysis, benefits for clients, and challenges around auditor skills, data security and regulation.
bullets: AI enables analysis of full populations (AI Transaction Scoring Tool) rather than traditional sampling.
Clara AI provides conversational assistance and specialized agents to support auditors.
KPMG Clara platform offers real-time management of audits and Clara for Clients improves client communication.
AI supports documentation and disclosure analysis, speeding repetitive and data-intensive tasks.
Discussion covers auditor reskilling, implementation challenges, data security/regulatory issues and potential AI risks.
takeaways: Expect more comprehensive audits as AI tools enable full-population analysis rather than sampling.
Faster, more data-driven audit processes may shorten audit cycles and increase frequency of reporting.
Ensure your data security and regulatory compliance practices are robust when interacting with AI-enhanced audits.
Prepare for different auditor interactions as auditors adopt new AI-enabled workflows and ask more data-focused questions.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG where players act as the Endministrator on Talos-II; the trailer was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
bullets: Arknights: Endfield launch trailer showcases NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation.
Game genre: 3D real-time strategy RPG; player role is the Endministrator on Talos-II.
Trailer capture details: GeForce RTX 5080, 4K Ultra settings, DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X Mode.
Official links provided for DLSS 4 info and the game's website and social channels.
Published by NVIDIA GeForce on 2026-01-21.
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is a prominent feature in the launch marketing—support for DLSS 4 should be considered for high-end gaming/content workflows.
The trailer capture on an RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra suggests workloads that target recent, high-performance GPUs for content capture and demonstration.
Deployments or test labs intended for similar captures should validate driver and SDK compatibility for DLSS 4 and Multi Frame Generation.
4K Ultra captures using DLSS 4 MFG 4X Mode imply demands on GPU compute and memory; capacity planning should account for high-resolution render/capture scenarios.
